alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northeastern Nye County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 7:16PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Wet roadways and sub-freezing temperatures could cause slick driving conditions tonight due to flash freeze... Recent precipitation from today`s winter storm have caused roads to become wet. Forecast low temperatures are expected to drop into the teens and 20s. This will result in flash freezes on area roadways, especially on bridges and overpasses. If traveling during the overnight, please use caution as roadways, bridges, and overpasses could be icy and slick. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
